body:
Hello fellow minecrafters

I'm bored, I want to answer some questions.

I will answer most things, all with 100% honesty. Don't ask me something if you presume you know the answer and my answer won't effect your opinion.

I'm 13, nearly 14, I play CS:GO mainly and I'm still in ESEA Open. I got back into coding a while ago but I'm bored with it now and I don't have time seeing as I play CS so much. I was a developer for Kohi and Avalanche 2+ years ago.

I'll probably add more information here when I think of it.

AMAA
body_tagged:
Hello fellow minecrafters

I'm bored, I want to answer some questions.

I will answer most things, all with 100% honesty. Don't ask me something if you presume you know the answer and my answer won't effect your opinion.

I'm 13, nearly 14, I play CS:GO mainly and I'm still in ESEA Open. I got back into coding a while ago but I'm bored with it now and I don't have time seeing as I play CS so much. I was a developer for Kohi and Avalanche 2+ years ago.

I'll probably add more information here when I think of it.

AMAA

replies.body:
No, I never have
You should probably win the tournament. You've improved a lot but you are the only good team who play minecraft a lot. I think you might be at your peak as a team, but you do have a lot of pretty good players. The only teams I see beating you are PPB, maybe us and some OCN teams possibly.
I never actually realised you were a good team. Obviously I don't really scrim on OCN considering the fact it's 1.9, but I never thought you could be so good. However, I think the team have done quite well.
No clue.
Decent with sword and bow, I don't think you're outstanding but you're not bad and you're certainly better than me and kiwi. You're quite chill as well.

replies.body:
You never really came to me as a good or bad player, never really spoke to you.
Football, Manchester United
Arguments and being staff warned for telling Iron to 'shut the fuck up' on slack. Seriously though, I enjoy working with so many different people.
I don't watch a lot of videos from one person, it's more if I see a video that I like in my sub box I'll watch it.
I read quite a bit if I enjoy the book I'm reading, I could say I have a favourite book but I like fighting and secret service stuff.
I think the whole Berzerk salt stuff has just became a meme, you're weren't that salty. I only dislike the fact that you said no to letting bc play in the final, although that was Pelp's fault and he's dumb af because I probably would've said the same and so would anybody else. I still don't know how you found me toggle sneaking in my video.

You never really came to me as a good or bad player, never really spoke to you.

I read quite a bit if I enjoy the book I'm reading, I could say I have a favourite book but I like fighting and secret service stuff.
I think the whole Berzerk salt stuff has just became a meme, you're weren't that salty. I only dislike the fact that you said no to letting bc play in the final, although that was Pelp's fault and he's dumb af because I probably would've said the same and so would anybody else. I still don't know how you found me toggle sneaking in my video.
